text: The people who did not like him
the most tiresome boy that ever lived
the wise men in the whole world
so many worthy lads thirsting for instruction in geography and history and reading and ciphering
the side of the town where the green woods and hedges grew
the mountain where the great rocks
a very large old gentleman asleep after dinner
the pale person in a very faint voice
quite another part of the mountain
red - roofed farms and plots of gold corn
the quiet river edged with willow and alder
the cockatrice , who seemed to be growing weary of the subject
a large gentleman asleep after dinner
the dragon , lying asleep in the sun
a person who carried a cane
the revered Head of the nice school where your good parents are kind enough to send you
